actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Armed Services.

official_title: A bill to direct the Secretary of Defense to make veterans with service-connected disabilities and their surviving spouses eligible for commissary and post-exchange privileges.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of Defense to make veterans with service-connected disabilities and their spouses eligible for commissary and post-exchange privileges.

titles.title: A bill to direct the Secretary of Defense to make veterans with service-connected disabilities and their surviving spouses eligible for commissary and post-exchange privileges.
